group_1.textLeft: Hey, there, what's wrong?

group_1.textRight: *Sniff* I've been coming here...for a hundred @days now...
But nothing's changed, so I'm here @to file a complaint... *Sob*

group_1.narration: Manaka Kurumi, the true Obsessive Devotress, @is the heiress of Walnut's, a Western-style restaurant. @She was worried about her restaurant's lack @of popularity, so she started regularly praying here.

group_1.textRight: ...But deep down, I knew this wasn't the way @to fix things.
Still, our food is absolutely delicious,
and we've done everything we can @to promote it...
This is all I have left... @I'm clinging to this last lifeline...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry...just hearin' about food has @gotten me hungry, haha...
Oh, on that note...why don't we all go out @to eat at Manaka's restaurant?

group_1.narration: So then we went to Walnut's with Manaka. @From looks alone, it was a splendid restaurant, @and I simply couldn't fathom @why there were so few customers...

group_1.textLeft: So what would you all like to order?
Alright, it won't take long.

group_1.textCenter: No, not that way. The ones on the shelf.

group_1.textLeft: Looks like she's not the only one working here.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I didn't see them earlier.

group_1.textCenter: Here's the Walnut's special: fluffy omelet rice!

group_1.textRight: Th-this is amazing...! The texture is perfect...

group_1.textLeft: Yum... I didn't realize food this good was real!

group_1.textRight: It's delicious, of course, but the eggs... @Aren't they fantastic?!
The yolk is so rich... I've never had anything @like this before!

group_1.textLeft: We only use the finest ingredients, of course!

group_1.textRight: How is this place not popular?!

group_1.textLeft: I know, right? I have no idea what we've @been doing wrong...

group_1.textRight: ...Not to derail the discussion, but I feel like @I'm being watched from the kitchen.

group_1.textLeft: Being watched...? Ah, that must be my senpai. @Why don't you come introduce yourself?

group_1.textCenter: N-no, I can't... The real Yachiyo Nanami's there... @My role model...

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, Senpai's mentioned there was @a model she really admired...
Wait, you're saying that was Yachiyo Nanami?

group_1.textCenter: You didn't know, Manaka?! @I've been her fan all my life...!

group_1.textRight: Oh, really? I've been retired for quite @some time now...
Still, I'm honestly very glad to hear you say that.

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, Ria, a chance to meet your hero @doesn't happen every day, now.
How about you come out here for a change?

...[chara:300902:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300092:motion_0][chara:300902:cheek_0][chara:300902:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300902:lipSynch_1]Looks like that's a no. Sorry about that.@My senpai's a shy one.
It makes me think of when I first met Ria, back @when I was making my high school debut.
She looked so miserable, and I could tell she @was hungry...
I couldn't stand to see her like that, so I gave her @a lunch box, and the rest is history.

group_1.textCenter: You don't have to give them our whole life story...!
Oh, um, but Walnut's really is delicious.
Maybe Yachiyo could use her influence to help @promote the place...or something?

group_1.textRight: I'm just a former model; I'm not that influential...

group_1.textLeft: But I want us to at least do something.
I can't believe that a restaurant as good as this @is going unnoticed...
(Isn't there something I can do for this girl...?)

group_1.textCenter: ...And all of that has been @making me wonder...
...if there's something I can do to repay @everyone's kindness.
I'm always receiving happiness from people,
so I wish I could give that back to others...
